exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0%nat Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp <> Op n : nat Hn1 : (1 < n)%nat Hn2 : (n < p - 1)%nat H : forall x y, x <> Zp -> inv x = y -> y ⊗ x = Op Unable to unify "?M1476 ⊗ ?M1475 = Op" with "〚 1 〛 = inv 〚 n 〛".

In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0%nat Hp' : prime p Hp'' : (2 <= p)%nat Hzero_one : Zp <> Op n : nat Hn1 : (1 < n)%nat Hn2 : (n < p - 1)%nat Unable to unify "(n < p - 1)%nat" with "〚 1 〛 = inv 〚 n 〛".

original: intros. destruct H as (Hn1, Hn2). exists 1%nat. split. - lia. - apply Zp_invert_eq_not_zero. + apply Hn2. + apply Zp_inj. * lia. * reflexivity.
